attribute.name: betweenKeyUp
attribute.description: If the time between two keyup events is lower than this given value, the ajax request will not be fired. In milliseconds. Prevents stressing the server with too much user inputs

attribute.name: startRequest
attribute.description: The AJAX Request is only triggered if the number of chars typed in is equal or greater than this given value.

attribute.name: nextPageFieldClass
attribute.description: StyleClass for the div field which steps to next page

attribute.name: columnHoverClass
attribute.description: StyleClass for a onmouseover event of the suggested columns

attribute.name: columnOutClass
attribute.description: StyleClass for a onmouseout event of the suggested columns

attribute.name: var
attribute.description: Same principle as it can be found in dataTable. SuggestedItemsMethod returns a list of objects, where the class variables can be accessed with the alias after the dot of the var.
